review_data.title: Delicious
review_data.content: I tested the gyosa and tantanmen ramen. The food was amazingly good !! However, I find it not normal to pay additional fees to get served water at the table. Prices are already high enough for the food... Service should be included.

review_data.title: Great place for Ramen
review_data.content: Great service, good food, fast and good value for money. Very friendly service, accommodated us with our little dog. Very attentive to customer well being. Above all, the ramen is great, had tantanmen... spicy and great taste. Would recommend to all Ramen lovers !!!

review_data.title: Crowded
review_data.content: The food is good. The restaurant is tiny, they gave us a small table for four people, we had to place some of their table stuff on the floor to make space (e.g menus) They are so busy / packed that they kick you out...More

review_data.title: Authentisches Essen

review_data.title: Great ramen in Zurich
review_data.content: Splendid and authentic food including japaneesse brews. Well freqented on saturdays. Soups ca 20 chf.

review_data.title: Perfect ramen, cozy and laid back atmosphere.
review_data.content: I've had quite a number of ramen in my life and Miki Ramen ranks among the top of them. Especially the noodles are out of this world! Add to that a very japanese style interior and friendly service and there you have it. Prices are...More

review_data.title: Lecker frisch typisch japanisch
review_data.content: Schmackhaft, frisch, schön angerichtet, authentisch, man fühlt sich in Japan, faire Preise, netter Service

review_data.title: yummy but lousy service

review_data.title: Super feine Suppe gegessen
review_data.content: Kleines hübsches Resti, super tolle Ramen-Suppe gegessen, sehr empfehlenswert!! Gutes Preis/Leistungsverhälnis...

review_data.title: Fantastic atmosphere and delicious food!
review_data.content: Irrespective of whether you like small meals or big meals, MIKI offers a variety of dishes for everyone. I adore the delicious meat gyoza as a starter and spicy tantamen ramen. Also the various rice dishes with minced meat or eggplant which have an unusual...More

review_data.title: One of the better Ramen in town
review_data.content: It's no secret, that Ramen in Switzerland never taste as good as in Japan. I'm not sure why no one manages to serve real authentic Japanese ramen. Nevertheless, Miki's (and his sister ikoo's) are certainly one of the better addresses for a tasty Ramen bowl....More

review_data.title: Delicious ramen
review_data.content: Food I had a vegetarian miso ramen and my friends had ramen with clear broth and pork. We were all very happy with our dishes. The miso broth was delicious! No idea if it's authentic, since I've never been to Japan, but I read in...More

review_data.title: Beste Ramen in Zürich
review_data.content: Sehr unkomplizierte Atmosphäre und immer viel los. Die Ramen und Goyza sehr frisch und unglaublich lecker. Die Bedienung jung und...More

review_data.title: Surprise find!
review_data.content: A pleasant surprise to find an authentic ramen place in a quiet part of Zurich on a weekend :) Very delicious and great service and totally value for money!! :) Highly recommended.

review_data.title: Delicious ramen
review_data.content: We thoroughly enjoyed our lunch here. Service was swift and friendly. Most importantly the noodles were delicious, accompanied by great soups and toppings. Everything was well seasoned and spicy meant spicy. This is frequently not the case in CH. Will definitely return.

review_data.title: Very good food! Great beverage selection
review_data.content: This ramen gem is a very good place for a fast but also a long dinner. They have the same menu for lunch. The prizes are low and the quality is very high. Everything tastes just very yummy. Thank you very much.

review_data.title: Japanese Food rocks!
review_data.content: Service, Ramen, Beer & Atmosphere are top! Great, fast service and tasty dishes. It is small and you have to feel comfy to seat with other guests on one table. I'm looking forward to my next visit. Definitely recommendable.

review_data.title: Nice ramen place
review_data.content: Was looking for a ramen place in Zurich after some trips to Japan and was lucky to find this place. can be crowed.

review_data.title: Like in Japan
review_data.content: The quality of the ramen it's very good. I'm italian so no an expert of Ramen , but remember me the same taste that I tried 10 years ago traveling around from Hokkaido to Kyushu :)

review_data.title: Comfortable ramen place

review_data.title: Délicieux mais cher
review_data.content: Délicieux repas entre amis dans ce petit restaurant de ramen, qui sert une cuisine au goût authentique et travaillée. Petit...More

review_data.title: Good, not heaven and a few cons.

review_data.title: ramen super, service katastrophe

review_data.title: Ottimo

review_data.title: Heaven
review_data.content: Ramen rules. But this places goes beyond that. The taste is amazing and I loved all I tried. Do not skip the Gyosas and eat slowly to enjoy this excellent place. Zurich is so expensive that even ramen is expensive. But this is a fair...More

review_data.title: für Ramen Liebhaber
review_data.content: Die offene Küche, das lockere Personal und die begrenzte Anzahl Sitzplätze machen für mich persönlich das Lokal sehr sympathisch.

review_data.title: Nice, compact place to eat
review_data.content: Small location, tight on space, but nice atmosphere. Good food, well made, and very friendly service. Ideal for: - a nice date in a relaxed atmosphere. - small groups of 4 or less

review_data.title: Great!
review_data.content: The best ramen in zurich. Small and cozy place with a small but sufficient menu, they make what they do best, Ramen! Althought be gyoza is pretty good as well. The prices are good especially if you compare it with the quality that you get....More

review_data.title: Authentic Ramen in a beautiful design
review_data.content: I often come here for a ramen soup. You get a choice of different broths for your ramen. There is also a range of other options and nice little Japanese desserts and drinks. The minimalistic Japanese design is very appealing in this little place. Come...More

review_data.title: Sehr schmackhafte, reichhaltige Ramen
review_data.content: Wir waren an einem Freitagabend im Miki. Eine Reservation ist sehr zu empfehlen, das Lokal ist gut besucht. Mit den...More

review_data.title: Little Japan in Zürich
review_data.content: If you want to live a full Japanese experience, with the food and the atmosphere as well, this is the right place for you! Very small (and crowded) place, Miki Ramen has unique soups. Really wonderful! Finally, also the price is ok for the standard...More

review_data.title: Disappointing soba
review_data.content: We really enjoyed the starters, nice silky tofu. Most of us had ramen, the signature dish available with different broths. I went for the soba because they are my favourites, but was disappointed because I expected buckwheat. Dessert was nice, particularly the black sesame mochi.

review_data.title: Super Nudelsuppe, guter Wein, netter Service
review_data.content: Hier passt eigentlich alles für Leute welche gerne Nudelsuppen essen. Perfekte Würze, grosse Portionen, dazu einen Wein zu fairem Preis...More

review_data.title: raving Ramen
review_data.content: A delightful, quite small, restaurant servicing authentic ramen dishes. We did well to get in by popping in earlier in the evening and reserving a table (on a Tuesday). The ramen was fantastic and a reasonable selection of beers to go along. A couple of...More

review_data.title: Leckere Ramen
review_data.content: Gute Ramen in angenehmen Ambiente, frisch Gyoza, Japanisches Bier, sehr freundliche Bedienung und das Ganze zu einem angemessenen Preis. Hingehen...More

review_data.title: Limiting choice for gluten intolerance, meat was oddly cold
review_data.content: Well, was this authentic - yes. Was it nice - yes. Was it amazeballs - no, unfortunately. It was a shame they didn't have a pack of rice noodles for those with gluten intolerance, Fully appreciate it's a 'ramen' restaurant and not a 'rice noodle'...More

review_data.title: Traditional Japanese Ramen in Zurich
review_data.content: This place is a hidden gem in Zurich. It is very small but the ramen are delicious! A big treat is the fact that you can watch them make the food from your table. Good value for money for excellent food. Don't miss out on...More

review_data.title: The hunt for an authentic ramen in Zurich comes to an end!
review_data.content: Visited this place last night. My friend and I were dead keen on ramen and kept calling the restaurant but no one picked up. So we decided to try our luck and just turn up. We reached shortly after opening time but they were full....More

review_data.title: Authentic Ramen in Zurich

review_data.title: Excellent Ramen in a Hip Setting

review_data.title: Japanese done differently
